function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Severe drop in productivity due to social distancing and work-from-home measures","Impact":"Reduced output and efficiency in manufacturing organizations","Mitigation":"Implement flexible work policies, invest in remote work technology","Technologies":"Remote work tools, collaboration and communication software","People":"Workers in manufacturing organizations","Owner":"Management and HR departments"},{"Description":"Interruption of business projects and decrease in revenue","Impact":"Loss of revenue and business continuity for consulting companies","Mitigation":"Diversify project types, establish remote project management capabilities","Technologies":"Project management software, remote collaboration tools","People":"Consulting company employees","Owner":"Business management and project managers"}]}
